page.title: 16Shops and Stalls - one
page.content: The Post Office is open every day apart from Sunday and Saturday afternoon.The most regular service provided is old age pensions (which is collected on a Thursday) Giro, postal orders and savings. Most of the people who shop at the post office come from Wickhamford and Childswickham where they have not got a post office.They also sell groceries, fruit, vegetables, sherry, cider, beer and frozen meat etc. and things like pet requirements.As well as the main shop Mr Winket makes and sells sheds, rocking horses, summer houses, rabbit hutches, garden furniture, garden frogs and gnomes. Also Mr Winket does films for parties. The post office employs a local family and one other person.
